SEARCH
Package Models

Class MedicalRecordManager

java.lang.Object
Models.MedicalRecordManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MedicalRecordInterface
public class MedicalRecordManager extends Object implements MedicalRecordInterface
The MedicalRecordManager class is responsible for managing the medical records of patients. It provides methods to create, update, read, and delete medical records, as well as manage persistence by reading and writing records to a CSV file. It implements the MedicalRecordInterface interface.
Since:
2024-11-21
Version:
1.0

  • Field Details

    • medicalRecordList

      public static List<MedicalRecord> medicalRecordList

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalRecordManager

      public MedicalRecordManager()
      Constructs a new MedicalRecordManager instance. This constructor reads the medical records from the CSV file and initializes the medicalRecordList by parsing the data from the file. It ensures that existing records are merged and new records are added properly.

  • Method Details

    • getMedicalRecordList

      public static MedicalRecordManager getMedicalRecordList()
      Gets the singleton instance of the MedicalRecordManager. If the instance does not exist, it creates a new one. This method ensures that only one instance of the manager exists throughout the application's lifecycle.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the MedicalRecordManager.

    • updateCSV

      public static int updateCSV()
      Updates the medical records CSV file with the current data in medicalRecordList. The method writes all the records to the CSV file in a format with headers "ID", "Diagnosis", "Medication", and "Treatment".
      Returns:
      0 to indicate the successful update of the CSV file.

    • createMedicalRecord

      public static MedicalRecord createMedicalRecord(String patientID)
      Creates a new medical record for a patient with the given patient ID. If a record already exists for the patient, the method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient for whom the medical record is to be created.
      Returns:
      The newly created MedicalRecord object for the patient.

    • readAllMedicalRecords

      public static int readAllMedicalRecords()
      Reads and prints all the medical records stored in medicalRecordList. The method prints the patient ID, diagnosis, medication, and treatment for each record.
      Returns:
      1 to indicate successful reading and printing of all medical records.

    • readMedicalRecordsByPatientID

      public static int readMedicalRecordsByPatientID(String patientID)
      Reads and prints the medical records for a specific patient identified by the patient ID. If no records are found for the given patient ID, the method prints an error message.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose medical records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The number of records found and printed for the given patient. Returns -1 for invalid IDs, and 0 if no records are found for the patient.

    • updateMedicalRecord

      public static MedicalRecord updateMedicalRecord(String patientID, String diagnosis, String medication, String treatment)
      Updates the medical record for a given patient identified by the patient ID. If no record exists for the patient, a new record is created. The method adds a new diagnosis, medication, and treatment to the patient's existing record.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose medical record is to be updated.
      diagnosis - The diagnosis to be added to the medical record.
      medication - The medication to be added to the medical record.
      treatment - The treatment to be added to the medical record.
      Returns:
      The updated or newly created MedicalRecord object.

    • deleteMedicalRecord

      public static boolean deleteMedicalRecord(String patientID)
      Deletes the medical record for a patient identified by the patient ID. If no record exists for the patient, the method returns false.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose medical record is to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the medical record was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
